message.content:
# Verificar que el archivo llegó correctamente
  ls -lh /tmp/moonyetis-clean.tar.gz

  # Crear directorio de proyecto
  mkdir -p /var/www/moonyetis-slots
  cd /var/www/moonyetis-slots

  # Extraer el proyecto limpio
  tar -xzf /tmp/moonyetis-clean.tar.gz --strip-components=1

  # Verificar que es la versión correcta (sin botones Auto/Turbo)
  ls -la frontend/
  grep -c "id=\"autoSpinBtn\"\|id=\"turboBtn\"" frontend/index.html

  # Verificar estructura completa
  ls -la

# Mover proyecto a la ubicación correcta

mv /root/moonyetis-backend/* /var/www/moonyetis-slots/

mv /root/moonyetis-backend/.* /var/www/moonyetis-slots/ 2>/dev/null || true

rmdir /root/moonyetis-backend

# Ir al directorio correcto

cd /var/www/moonyetis-slots

# Verificar estructura

ls -la

# Instalar dependencias

npm install

# Verificar package.json

cat package.json | head -20

**📋 SIGUIENTE SECUENCIA:**

1. ✅ Instalar dependencias Node.js

2. ⏳ Configurar PostgreSQL (nueva BD)

3. ⏳ Variables de entorno (.env.production)

4. ⏳ Configurar PM2

5. ⏳ Configurar Nginx

6. ⏳ Verificar funcionamiento completo

# PASO 2: Configurar PostgreSQL

# Verificar PostgreSQL está corriendo

systemctl status postgresql

# Crear base de datos y usuario

sudo -u postgres psql << EOF

CREATE DATABASE moonyetis_slots;

CREATE USER moonyetis_user WITH PASSWORD 'Pichari9Ean21ñ';

GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE moonyetis_slots TO moonyetis_user;

ALTER USER moonyetis_user CREATEDB;

\q

EOF

# Inicializar base de datos con el script

cd /var/www/moonyetis-slots

sudo -u postgres psql moonyetis_slots < init_database.sql

# Verificar creación de tablas

sudo -u postgres psql -d moonyetis_slots -c "\dt"

# Test de conexión

PGPASSWORD='Pichari9Ean21ñ' psql -h localhost -U moonyetis_user -d moonyetis_slots -c "SELECT 1;"

**Este paso creará:**

- ✅ Base de datos moonyetis_slots nueva

- ✅ Usuario moonyetis_user con la contraseña conocida

- ✅ Todas las tablas (users, transactions, game_rounds, etc.)

- ✅ Test de conexión funcional

    23→    vip_status BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    24→    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
    25→    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    26→);
    27→
    28→-- Create transactions table
    29→CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transactions (
    30→    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    31→    tx_hash VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    32→    wallet_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    33→    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, -- 'deposit', 'withdrawal', 'game_win', 'game_loss'
    34→    token_amount DECIMAL(20, 8) DEFAULT 0,
    35→    game_chips DECIMAL(20, 8) DEFAULT 0,
    36→    fee DECIMAL(20, 8) DEFAULT 0,
    37→    bonus_chips DECIMAL(20, 8) DEFAULT 0,
    38→    status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending', -- 'pending', 'completed', 'failed', 'archived'
    39→    game_round_id VARCHAR(255),
    40→    block_height BIGINT,
    41→    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
    42→    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    43→);
    44→
    45→-- Create game_rounds table
    46→CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS game_rounds (
    47→    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    48→    round_id VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    49→    wallet_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    50→    session_id VARCHAR(255),
    51→    bet_amount DECIMAL(20, 8) NOT NULL,
    52→    win_amount DECIMAL(20, 8) DEFAULT 0,
    53→    reel_results TEXT, -- JSON string of reel results
    54→    game_hash VARCHAR(255),
    55→    server_seed VARCHAR(255),
    56→    client_seed VARCHAR(255),
    57→    nonce INTEGER,
    58→    multiplier DECIMAL(10, 4) DEFAULT 0,
    59→    is_win BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    60→    rtp DECIMAL(10, 4) DEFAULT 0,
    61→    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()
    62→);
    63→
    64→-- Create indexes for better performance
    65→CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_user_accounts_wallet ON user_accounts(wallet_address);
    66→CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_wallet ON transactions(wallet_address);
    67→CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_type ON transactions(type);
    68→CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_status ON transactions(status);
    69→CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_transactions_created ON transactions(created_at);
    70→CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_game_rounds_wallet ON game_rounds(wallet_address);
    71→CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_game_rounds_created ON game_rounds(created_at);
    72→
    73→-- Create updated_at trigger function
    74→CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column()
    75→RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
    76→BEGIN
    77→    NEW.updated_at = NOW();
    78→    RETURN NEW;
    79→END;
    80→$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
    81→
    82→-- Create triggers for updated_at
    83→DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_user_accounts_updated_at ON user_accounts;
    84→CREATE TRIGGER update_user_accounts_updated_at
    85→    BEFORE UPDATE ON user_accounts
    86→    FOR EACH ROW
    87→    EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
    88→
    89→DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS update_transactions_updated_at ON transactions;
    90→CREATE TRIGGER update_transactions_updated_at
    91→    BEFORE UPDATE ON transactions
    92→    FOR EACH ROW
    93→    EXECUTE FUNCTION update_updated_at_column();
    94→
    95→-- Grant permissions to moonyetis_user
    96→GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ALL TABLES IN SCHEMA public TO moonyetis_user;
    97→GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ALL SEQUENCES IN SCHEMA public TO moonyetis_user;
    98→GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA public TO moonyetis_user;
    99→
   100→-- Set default privileges for future tables
   101→ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES IN SCHEMA public GRANT ALL ON TABLES TO moonyetis_user;
   102→ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES IN SCHEMA public GRANT ALL ON SEQUENCES TO moonyetis_user;
   103→
   104→-- Insert test data (optional)
   105→INSERT INTO user_accounts (wallet_address, game_chips) 
   106→VALUES ('test_wallet_address', 1000.0) 
   107→ON CONFLICT (wallet_address) DO NOTHING;
   108→
   109→COMMIT;

# MoonYetis Slots - Configuración de Producción
# ===============================================

# Configuración del Servidor
NODE_ENV=production
PORT=3000
HOST=0.0.0.0
DOMAIN=moonyetis-slots.com

# Base de Datos Redis (Session Store)
REDIS_HOST=localhost
REDIS_PORT=6379
REDIS_PASSWORD=your_ultra_secure_redis_password_here
REDIS_DB=0

# Base de Datos PostgreSQL (Transacciones)
POSTGRES_HOST=localhost
POSTGRES_PORT=5432
POSTGRES_DB=moonyetis_production
POSTGRES_USER=moonyetis
POSTGRES_PASSWORD=your_ultra_secure_postgres_password_here

# Red Fractal Bitcoin (PRODUCCIÓN)
FRACTAL_NETWORK_TYPE=mainnet
FRACTAL_RPC_URL=https://fractal-rpc.unisat.io
FRACTAL_API_URL=https://fractal-api.unisat.io
FRACTAL_INDEXER_URL=https://fractal-indexer.unisat.io
FRACTAL_EXPLORER_URL=https://fractal.unisat.io

# Token MoonYetis
MOONYETIS_CONTRACT=bc1p_your_real_contract_address_here
MOONYETIS_DEPLOY_INSCRIPTION=your_deploy_inscription_id_here

# Seguridad
JWT_SECRET=your_ultra_secure_jwt_secret_256_bits_here
SESSION_SECRET=your_ultra_secure_session_secret_here
ENCRYPTION_KEY=your_ultra_secure_encryption_key_here

# Monitoreo y Alertas
LOG_LEVEL=info
ENABLE_METRICS=true
DISCORD_WEBHOOK=https://discord.com/api/webhooks/your_webhook_here
SLACK_WEBHOOK=https://hooks.slack.com/services/your_webhook_here

# SSL Certificates
SSL_CERT_PATH=/etc/ssl/certs/moonyetis-slots.crt
SSL_KEY_PATH=/etc/ssl/private/moonyetis-slots.key

# CORS Origins (Solo dominios de producción)
CORS_ORIGINS=https://moonyetis-slots.com,https://www.moonyetis-slots.com

# Rate Limiting
RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW=60000
RATE_LIMIT_MAX=100

# House Wallet (IMPORTANTE: Configurar con wallet real)
HOUSE_WALLET_ADDRESS=bc1p_your_house_wallet_address_here
HOUSE_WALLET_PRIVATE_KEY=your_house_wallet_private_key_here

# Alertas Ultra-Accesibles
ALERT_LOW_BALANCE=true
ALERT_HIGH_WIN_RATE=true
ALERT_UNUSUAL_PATTERNS=true

# Base de Datos PostgreSQL (Transacciones)
POSTGRES_HOST=localhost
POSTGRES_PORT=5432

POSTGRES_USER=moonyetis
POSTGRES_PASSWORD=your_ultra_secure_postgres_password_here

# Red Fractal Bitcoin (PRODUCCIÓN)
FRACTAL_NETWORK_TYPE=mainnet
FRACTAL_RPC_URL=https://fractal-rpc.unisat.io
FRACTAL_API_URL=https://fractal-api.unisat.io
FRACTAL_INDEXER_URL=https://fractal-indexer.unisat.io
FRACTAL_EXPLORER_URL=https://fractal.unisat.io

# Token MoonYetis
MOONYETIS_CONTRACT=bc1p_your_real_contract_address_here
MOONYETIS_DEPLOY_INSCRIPTION=your_deploy_inscription_id_here

# Seguridad
JWT_SECRET=your_ultra_secure_jwt_secret_256_bits_here
SESSION_SECRET=your_ultra_secure_session_secret_here
ENCRYPTION_KEY=your_ultra_secure_encryption_key_here

# Monitoreo y Alertas
LOG_LEVEL=info
ENABLE_METRICS=true
DISCORD_WEBHOOK=https://discord.com/api/webhooks/your_webhook_here
SLACK_WEBHOOK=https://hooks.slack.com/services/your_webhook_here

# SSL Certificates

SSL_KEY_PATH=/etc/ssl/private/moonyetis-slots.key

# CORS Origins (Solo dominios de producción)

# Rate Limiting
RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW=60000
RATE_LIMIT_MAX=100

HOUSE_WALLET_PRIVATE_KEY=your_house_wallet_private_key_here

ALERT_LOW_BALANCE=true

ALERT_UNUSUAL_PATTERNS=true

message.content:
**PASO 4: Configurar PM2**

cd /var/www/moonyetis-slots

# Verificar archivo ecosystem.config.js existe

ls -la ecosystem.config.js

# Ver configuración PM2

cat ecosystem.config.js

# Iniciar aplicación con PM2

pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production

# Verificar estado

pm2 status

# Ver logs para confirmar que inició correctamente

pm2 logs --lines 20

# Configurar autostart

pm2 save

pm2 startup

# Test de salud del servidor

curl http://localhost:3000/api/health || curl http://localhost:3000 | head -10

**Este paso debería:**

- ✅ Iniciar el servidor con PM2

- ✅ Conectar a PostgreSQL correctamente

- ✅ Cargar las variables de entorno

- ✅ Configurar autostart del sistema

- ✅ Confirmar que responde en puerto 3000

**¿PM2 inicia la aplicación sin errores de base de datos?**
